EmailTemplate.name: Rename Site
EmailTemplate.subject: Rename site on {!Account.Cust_ID__c} - {!Account.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
NEW PROCESS!!! All Contract Customer Maintenance, Pricing, SPC and ECommerce requests can now be submitted easily right from Salesforce.com! Beginning February 4, no further requests will be accepted via email. Please search "Account Maint" in the Answers tab to learn more information.
<Please copy contractmaint@officedepot.com into the additional cc field and remove this section>
Team,
Please rename {!Account.Cust_ID__c} to <Enter New Site Name here>.
Thank you
